Event.name: Attempt_action_scenario
Event.definition: <def-root>This frame represents the core action of an Attempt, where an <fen>Agent</fen> has a <fen>Goal</fen> and performs some <fen>Means</fen> action that they believe will achieve the <fen>Goal</fen>. See its two perspectivized frames for further information.</def-root>

Arg.name: Agent
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Agent</fen> makes an attempt to achieve a <fen>Goal</fen> via some <fen>Means</fen> <ex><fex name="Agent">John</fex> <t>attempted</t> to climb Mt. Everest.</ex> </def-root>

Arg.name: Goal
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Goal</fen> is what the <fen>Agent</fen> attempts to achieve.
<ex>John <t>attempted</t> <fex name="Goal">to climb Mt. Everest</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Outcome
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Outcome</fen> is the failure or success of an attempt to achieve a <fen>Goal</fen>. <ex>John's third <fex name="Outcome">failed</fex> <t>attempt</t> began propitiously.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Means
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Means</fen> by which an attempt occurs.</def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the attempt occurs.</def-root>

Arg.name: Depictive
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Depictive</fen> is a phrase which describes the <fen>Agent</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The place where an attempt is made.
<ex><fex name="Place">On the bridge</fex> he <t>attempted</t> to put the wig on.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Manner</fen> in which the <fen>Agent</fen> makes the attempt.
<ex>He <ment>made</ment> his final <t>attempt</t> <fex name="man">secretly</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Duration
Arg.definition: <def-root>The time peiod over which the attempts take place.</def-root>

Arg.name: Purpose
Arg.definition: <def-root>The reason for which the <fen>Agent</fen> attempts the <fen>Goal</fen>. </def-root>

Arg.name: Particular_iteration
Arg.definition: <def-root>Expressions marked with this extra-thematic FE modify a non-iterative use of the target, and indicate that it is conceived as embedded within an iterated series of similar events or states. In addition, most expressions of Particular_iteration indicate which instance of the series is being referred to.</def-root>

Arg.name: Circumstances
Arg.definition: <def-root>The state of the world (at a particular time and place) which is independent of the the attempt of the <fen>Agent</fen> to achieve the <fen>Goal</fen>. </def-root>

Arg.name: Condition
Arg.definition: <def-root>The conditions under which the the <fen>Agent</fen> attempts the <fen>Goal</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Frequency
Arg.definition: <def-root>This frame element is defined as the number of times the Attemping event occurs per some unit of time. </def-root>
